text: Ini Dima-Okojie (born June 24, 1990) is a Nigerian actress and entrepreneur. She left her job in investment banking to enroll in New York Film Academy. == Early life and education == In Dima-Okojie hails from Esan North-East LGA, Edo State, Nigeria. She holds bachelor's degree in International Relations from Covenant University, Nigeria. She also earn a degree in acting from the New York Film Academy. == Filmography == === TV shows === Year Title Role Notes Ref 2020 The Smart Money Woman Tami Based on a book of the same name by Arese Ugwu 2019 Oga! title: Ini Dima-Okojie
